Dear Team,
This is to inform you that, the Joiner/ Account request(s) has been submitted and approved for the following user(s) in Active Directory.
UserName : $!identityDisplayName
All the access for the user will be automatically assigned based on birthright roles.

EmailTemplate.Subject: User $!identityDisplayName Joiner Completion Notification
